Customer Lifecycle, Sales Funnel, and Content Strategy This article will walk you through the customer acquisition funnel for SaaS companies. The primary goal is to help you design, analyze, and optimize your customer acquisition process.

item.title: 21 Best Things I Learned From Over 50 SEO Courses
item.description:
21 Best Things I Learned From Over 50 SEO Courses

Over the past 7 years, I've read and watched over 50 SEO courses. There are only 21 SEO tips you need to out-optimize competitors for your target keywords in any industry.

item.title: How To Pitch A VC
item.description:
How To Pitch A VC

"Everyone" understands the high-level goals of a pitch: Make yourself memorable, and drive home your product's value. But working out how to put it all into one, non-boring pitch is another matter altogether -- and something we work on extensively as part of the 500 Accelerator.

item.title: 4 Ways Copywriting Can Boost Your E-commerce Conversion Rates
item.description:
4 Ways Copywriting Can Boost Your E-commerce Conversion Rates

Make your copy work more effectively for your e-commerce brand by matching the language to the intended audience.

item.title: Take on Your Competition with These Lessons from Google Maps
item.description:
Take on Your Competition with These Lessons from Google Maps

Bret Taylor is no stranger to being the underdog. From a scan of his resume, this may not seem to be true: MS in CS at Stanford; joined Google in 2003 and helped lead the team that co-created Google Maps; co-founded and was CEO of FriendFeed, which was successfully sold to Facebook in 2009; became CTO of Facebook until 2012; and finally co-founded and is currently CEO of startup Quip , which recently raised $30 million from Greylock and Benchmark.

item.title: Email Patterns for Web Apps
item.description:
Email Patterns for Web Apps

Another common pattern is to send a secondary welcome email from the Founder. This email is usually sent a few hours later or the next day. I have tried this in the past and it was so successful that it started taking me hours every day to reply to every user who wrote back.

item.title: 3 Lessons Learned From Testing Hundreds Of Onboarding Emails
item.description:
3 Lessons Learned From Testing Hundreds Of Onboarding Emails

We set out to build a better onboarding experience. Here's what we found.
